timeline.bodyText: I would throw something like AssertionError, to assure it is never caught.
timeline.author: arhimondr

replies.bodyText: I keep the logics unchanged as before,  just remove the dependency.
replies.author: viczhang861

replies.bodyText: Curious: why need to use static code block here ( instead of keeping the previous static variable initialization ?)
replies.author: wenleix

replies.bodyText:
Curious: why need to use static code block here ( instead of keeping the previous static variable initialization ?)

To avoid dependency,  the previous static initialization uses a function from package com.facebook.presto.util.Reflection inpresto-main
replies.author: viczhang861

timeline.bodyText: Why to replace toString with the equals and hashCode pair?
timeline.author: arhimondr

replies.bodyText:
toString() is not used, removed to avoid using guava
equals() and hashCode() is actually missing in test and should be added, for example,  BufferResult::equals() would be wrong without SerializedPage::equals()
replies.author: viczhang861

timeline.bodyText: equals and hashCode didn't exist in SerializedPage previously , right?
timeline.author: wenleix

replies.bodyText:
equals and hashCode didn't exist in SerializedPage previously , right?

Right
replies.author: viczhang861
